name: Jordan Matthews
persona: Jordan Matthews is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who is currently struggling academically, with a CGPA of 0.12. Jordan tends to have low motivation and self-discipline when it comes to studies, and does not set ambitious grade goals. However, Jordan does not experience much test anxiety, which suggests that stress is not a major barrier. With relatively low perseverance and academic self-efficacy, Jordan may benefit from additional academic support and motivation.
